a.title: Go to Gasconade County R-I School District

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

strong.span: is closed for the remainder of the 2019 – 2020 school year
Learning will continue through the remainder of the school term (May 14th) via our Alternative Method of Instruction (AMI). More details can be found on

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Verdana, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: We are expecting more guidance from DESE regarding summer school and what reentry will look like for students. As this information becomes available and we are able to make informed decisions, we will be sharing them with you as soon as possible. Communication from the district will continue through our social media outlets, district website, and parent emails.

strong.span: Our meal service program is also available through the remainder of the school term with the current schedule and locations. Please call 573-486-2116 ext. 1315 if you would like to be added to the list.

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-family: Verdana; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 52, 0);

High School 8:00 AM to 3:13 PM

a.title: Video
a.span: We LOVE Hermann...click here to watch the "Live Hermann" video!

p.br: Approximately 852 students are enrolled in the three schools operated by the Gasconade County R-I School District. Children in pre-kindergarten through grade 3 attend Hermann Elementary School. Hermann Middle School serves students in grades 4 through 8. Finally, Hermann High School, opened in 2000, houses students grades 9 through 12.

div.div: 170 Blue Pride Drive, Hermann, MO 65041 | Phone 573-486-2116 | Fax 573-486-3032
